name: Planar Gates
description: Magical gateways connecting to other planes of existence provide access to unique environments and resources. The planar connection provides opportunities for unique research and resources, while the otherworldly nature creates constant danger from planar threats.
atmosphere: Planar gateways pulse with reality-bending energy while planar threats emerge from gate shadows with otherworldly menace. The air carries alien atmospheres and visible distortions in space-time fabric. Every surface vibrates with otherworldly energy. Your skin tingles with reality-bending energy and the sense of dimensional danger.
